Room.Name: Aquaduct
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dark and wet brick lined aquaduct, running east and west.
Room.LongDescription: The way is slippery and wet, and you have to be verey cautious as you move along the tunnel. Its also quite dark. Hard to tell what you might find down here. Of course, nothing could live down here, right? The water flow is from west to east, so the water source must be further west. This old waterduct was probably built by the ancient islanders who worshipped at the ruined jungle temple located to the east.
